item.description:
Open Doors Manchester Art and Cultural Tour
Thursday, April 29, 2010
At the Millyard Museum and other venues
5:00 p.m.-8:00 p.m.
FREE Admission

This is the best way to get to know the city's brilliant and richly varied cultural landscape. Hop on the trolley and make the Millyard Museum one of your evening's destinations. Other venues include City Hall, SEE Science Center, Art 3 Gallery, Manchester Artists Association, Framers Market & Gallery and SOPHA (The Studio of Photographic Arts). Free and convenient parking is available outside the Millyard Museum at 200 Bedford Street and at Langer Place, 55 South Commercial Street. The Open Doors Project is a community endeavor of The Majestic Theatre.
item.name: Open Doors Manchester Art and Cultural Tour
